HAPPY SUGAR LIFE

About

Satou is a high school student who meets a mysterious young girl abandoned by her mother named Shio, and upon meeting her Satou quickly becomes attached to her. She secretly shares her apartment with the young whilst telling people she lives with her aunt. Although her intentions are pure and innocent but her actions to protect her happy life with this girl are questionable, she goes to great lengths to protect her “happy sugar life”.
